title: Chapter 1202 - Manifesting Life, Flying Light, Restricting The Profound
body:
Chapter 1202 - Manifesting Life, Flying Light, Restricting The Profound

Before the Divine Mountain of Perceiving the Profound.

Su Yi stood there and gazed up at the mountain.

According to the spirit sparrow, the mysteries of the Grand Dao emblazoned on the Chaos Dao Monuments were all derived from the chaos source of the Dark and Gold Star Realm. They included the mysteries of the countless Daos of the star realm’s earliest days.

Just like in the last trial, those who placed in the top three of the trial of perceiving the profound would receive an additional reward from Venerate Flooding Heavens.

The current highest scorer had perceived the mysteries of one thousand, nine hundred and thirty-three Chaos Dao Monuments!

Throughout the trial’s history, not one person had grasped all three thousand Chaos Dao Monuments to reach the peak!

“I have twenty-four hours, and I have to grasp the mysteries of at least ninety-nine Chaos Dao Monuments to pass. This is a trial of my powers of comprehension…” As Su Yi pondered, he arrived at the foot of the mountain.

A winding path led all the way to the peak of the Divine Mountain of Perceiving the Profound.

Both sides of the path were swathed in chaos mist and lined with ancient monuments.

The moment Su Yi stepped onto the path, the indistinct...
